page.title: 19NAIRN PUPIL IN LOCAL RADIO
page.content: I am Darren Adam,a pupil at Millbank Primary School and also a member of Moray Firth Radio's "RADIO ACTION" team,a group of volunteers who travel to Inverness to help out.I help out every Saturday,having got up at 6am! Here is a brief rundown of what i did on Saturday the 18th of May,1985 {0800}Arrive at MFR {0810}Make coffee for presenter,Brian Anderson {0900} Record 9.00 news {0930}Replace commercials {1010}Edit an interview { {1110}At ten minute interviews until 1500,play commercials {1200}Play national news {1203}Start record{1300} Play national news{1400}Play national news{1435 }Read out winners to a competition{1500}Play national news { {1501}Broadcast Schools Quiz {1600} Generally help out{1803}Play jingle{ {1810}Play commercials{1812}Go home
